titleStmt.title: Gospel publique worship: or, The translation, metaphrase, analysis, and exposition of Rom. 12. from v.1. to 8. Describing, and prescribing, the compleat pattern of gospel-worship. Also, an exposition of the 18th. chapter of Matthew. To which is added A discovery of Adam's three-fold estate in paradise, viz. moral, legal, and evangelical. / By Thomas Brewer.
titleStmt.author: Brewer, Thomas, fl. 1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid, for Henry Eversden, at the sign of the Greyhound in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "The exposition of the 18. chapter of Matthew" and "A discovery of Adams three-fold estate in Paradise" have separate dated title pages; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Greyhound in Pauls Church-yard
